member.name: ID2D1ResourceTexture.Update
member.summary: Updates the specific resource texture inside the specific range or box using the supplied data.
member.param: The "left" extent of the updates if specified; if NULL, the entire texture is updated.
The "right" extent of the updates if specified; if NULL, the entire texture is updated.
The stride to advance through the input data, according to dimension.
The number of dimensions in the resource texture. This must match the number used to load the texture.
The data to be placed into the resource texture.
The size of the data buffer to be used to update the resource texture.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.
